Title: Tornadoes strike Panyu, Shunde and Haifeng in Guangdong province, many factories and buildings damaged, in all killing at least 6, injuring 215, at least 10 furniture factories collapse
Description:
Tornadoes strike Panyu, Shunde districts of Guangdong province, many factories damaged and buildings damaged, in all killing 6, injuring 215

Shunde: at least 4 factories were affected, roofs blown away and structures damaged, though no reports of dead, injured yet in factories
In the region, at least four have died, 80 are being treated for injuries in hospitals and an additional 50 remain in hospital under observation

Panyu: several factories are affected, roofs blown off and structures damaged, several reports of heavy injuries sustained by workers, many workers hospitalized

Haifeng: tornadoes were mainly waterspouts, no serious harm recorded

Title: At least ten injured, including four firefighters, in a chemical factory explosion in Zhangzhou, Fujian; trapped workers evacuated
Description:
BBC English: Along with the six people taken to hospital, another 13 needed medical treatment.

FT: Chinese media reported on Monday evening that 14 people were wounded, two seriously, a figure later revised down by official media. The local fire department said photos circulated on social media of dead and injured were fake.

CDT: The following censorship instructions, issued to the media by government authorities, have been leaked and distributed online. The name of the issuing body has been omitted to protect the source.


Do not place news of the Zhangzhou, Fujian PX explosion in lead story sections of news agency websites. Take note and control negative commentary related to petrochemical projects. (April 7, 2015)
